message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $100. I think it would be a great fit for you!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest.  $60 is quite a bit lower than I was hoping for.  Could you do $90?
Hi Alice, I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to meet me at $75?
